titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Zimbabwe
Zimbabwe

div.head: Legislation
div.p: Records remain closed for 25 years after creation.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives of Zimbabwe, Borrowdale Road, Gunhill, Private Bag 7729, Causeway Harare
Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Munhumutapa Building, Samora Machel Ave, P.O. Box 4240 Harare

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Foreign researchers must apply for a permit from the Research Council of Zimbabwe before entering the country. Applications must include affiliation with a local institution, a research proposal and US$500 (or an amount as determined by the RCZ at any given time).
